name: Passage (itch) (TaiPrev)
description:
You control a boat in which you can transport souls. Once you touch the souls with your boat they will immediately be bound to it until you reach a destination, be it a good afterlife of bliss and peace or an eternity of pain and suffering. Be warned, bringing souls to their incorrect afterlife will be punished in your score.

CONTROLS:

-WASD/Arrow keys: Regular Up, Left, Down and Right movement controls.

-ESC: Finish and exit game.

This project was realised in Unreal Engine 4.
